data.name: Unreadable Ticket Format
data.description:
The story: Your friend just moved to a new country, and got a new job. Your friend rides the train to the company every day. However, the station prints train seats in a hard to understand format.

Having moved over with your friend, you decide to help him write a decoder, using your strong logic and interpreting skills.

The ticket is always formatted in car-row(seat). This isn't really readable, so you'd convert it to a readable format.

In each row, Seat A is the left window,

B is the left aisle,

C is the right aisle,

D is the right window.

So, a seat at car 4 row 12 seat B, the input would be ```4-12(B)```. The output would be expected to be ```Car 4 Row 12 Left Aisle```

All inputs are valid. No need for test of invalid inputs.
